EmailTemplate.description: Send customer a url link to e-LULA-N form
EmailTemplate.name: Contact: e-LULA-N link with Letterhead
EmailTemplate.subject: u-blox AG: Limited Use License Agreement (LULA-N) with u-blox AG
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please find below the link to the Limited Use License Agreement (LULA-N) with u-blox AG required for the NXP V2X SW package:
https://www.u-blox.com/en/limited-use-license-agreement-nxp?ub_contact__c={!User.Alias}
Under this link, you will be able to fill in a web form and to agree to the terms of the LULA by validly submitting the form.
We thank you and send you our best regards,
u-blox AG ZÃ¼rcherstrasse 68 8800 Thalwil Switzerland
Phone: +41 44 722 74 44 Fax: +41 44 722 74 47 Email: info@u-blox.com
